column2: Hobson "Roper" Gamgee]], an older brother of [[Gaffer Gamgee
column3: Hamfast Gamgee]]. Whereas his brother became a gardner, Andwise inherited the family [[Wikipedia:ropewalk
column6: Taming}}</ref> and continued the family trade. He left his ropewalk to his son [[Anson Roper
column7: Anson]] after his death, founding the [[Roper Family]].<ref name="Gamgee">{{App
